name: Time Warp (itch) (ZYGER)
description:
Your Reality Drive has broken down on your ship! Reality is slowly falling apart, fix the machine as it falls apart by re-attaching the pieces.

The gauge at the bottom of the screen shows the state of reality, Gravity and Game Speed change accordingly.

The timer at the top shows the remaining time before your helpful AI companion finishes repairing the ships drive, good luck!

Right click to grab objects and left click to throw them!
